name: Zelda Dashboard Icons *description for updated set
description:
Including all 6 Sage Medallions and the triforce. The Light Medallion, Forest Medallion, The Triforce, Fire Medallion, Water Medallion, Shadow Medallion, and the Spirit Medallion.
